# Azure DevOps Project Information

> **NOTE**: This file contains project-specific Azure DevOps configuration. Update this file with your actual project details.

## Project Details

- **Organization**: dynamicscrm
- **Project**: OneCRM
- **Repository**: CRM.Services.Scheduling
- **Repository URL**: https://dynamicscrm.visualstudio.com/OneCRM/_git/CRM.Services.Scheduling
- **Boards URL**: https://dynamicscrm.visualstudio.com/OneCRM/_boards
- **Area Path**: OneCRM\CRM.Services.Scheduling
- **Tracking Level**: Feature/Phase (not task)
- **Update Frequency**: Weekly (not per-task)
- **Iteration**: "OneCRM\Bi-Weekly\2025\2510\2510.3" `
- **Org**: "https://dynamicscrm.visualstudio.com"

## Azure DevOps Work Item Policy: Feature-Level Tracking

**Core Principle**: 
> **Azure DevOps Work Items track Features (Phases). tasks.md tracks individual Tasks.**

- **ADO Work Items (Features)**: Created for Phases (e.g., "Phase 2: Core Teams Tab Development")
- **tasks.md**: Contains detailed task breakdowns (e.g., Task 2.3.4, Task 2.3.5)
- **AI Auto-Sync**: Automatically updates ADO Feature work items after task completion

## Integration Rules

For detailed Azure DevOps integration rules, see `.github/copilot/azure-devops-integration.md`.
